name: FastenerTimberInterface
description: Creates a fastener-timber interface for use in defining fasteners and propagating features to timber elements.

inputParameters.name: outline_points
inputParameters.description: points defining the polyline that defines the shape of the interface plate.

inputParameters.name: thickness
inputParameters.description: The thickness of the interface plate.

inputParameters.name: drill_points
inputParameters.description: location of holes to be drilled in the interface plate and the timber elements.

inputParameters.name: drill_diameters
inputParameters.description: The diameter of the holes to be drilled in the interface plate and the timber elements.

inputParameters.name: extra_shapes
inputParameters.description: Closed Brep objects that make up the geometry of the fastener.

inputParameters.name: features
inputParameters.description: (optional) If True, the attributes in the referenced object will be updated/overwritten with the new values given here.

outputParameters.name: fastener interface
outputParameters.description: the fastener interface to be passed to the joint component.
